articles.title: US expects 100 million people vaccinated by February - Daily Mail
articles.description: Moncef Slaoui said Wednesday that between expected approval of Pfizer's shot in mid December and the end of February, at risk elderly people and frontline workers will get shots.
articles.content:
The US hopes to have immunized 100 million people against Covid-19 by the end of February, a top official said Wednesday, which is approximately 40 percent of the country's adult population.
